title: Here's everything to expect from Fed Chair Powell's speech Friday in Jackson Hole
content: For all the attention being paid to the speech, the chances of it containing any new news seem remote.
summary: For all the attention being paid to the speech, the chances of it containing any new news seem remote.

title: A recession is coming in the U.S., and 'a few rate cuts' won't prevent it, says strategist
content: Contrary to what many believe, investment research firm BCA Research sees that the economy is on the cusp of a recession.
summary: Contrary to what many believe, investment research firm BCA Research sees that the economy is on the cusp of a recession.

title: Asia markets mostly lower as investors await Powell's speech at Jackson Hole, assess Japan inflation data
content: While it is not exactly clear what Powell will say, he has previously used the speech to outline broad policy initiatives and to provide policy clues
summary: While it is not exactly clear what Powell will say, he has previously used the speech to outline broad policy initiatives and to provide policy clues

title: Harris accepts Democratic nomination, vows to be a 'common sense' president who 'unites us'
content: Kamala Harris is set to face Donald Trump in November's election. Her candidacy was set in motion when President Joe Biden withdrew his reelection bid.
summary: Kamala Harris is set to face Donald Trump in November's election. Her candidacy was set in motion when President Joe Biden withdrew his reelection bid.

title: FDA approves updated Pfizer, Moderna Covid vaccines as virus surges; shots to be available within days
content: The Covid jabs target a strain called KP.2, a descendant of the highly contagious omicron subvariant JN.1 that began circulating widely in the U.S. this year.
summary: The Covid jabs target a strain called KP.2, a descendant of the highly contagious omicron subvariant JN.1 that began circulating widely in the U.S. this year.

title: China's self-driving startup WeRide delays U.S. IPO as deadline looms
content: WeRide was expected to offer 6.5 million ADS (American depositary shares) in the range of $15.50 to $18.50.
summary: WeRide was expected to offer 6.5 million ADS (American depositary shares) in the range of $15.50 to $18.50.

title: Corporate loyalty does not pay off, HR expert says, as job hopping gains currency among young people
content: Just 23% of workers aged 42 and under expressed strong interest in staying with their companies long-term, according to a study by WorkProud.
summary: Just 23% of workers aged 42 and under expressed strong interest in staying with their companies long-term, according to a study by WorkProud.

title: Can a robot give a decent massage? We tested one at a luxury hotel in New York City
content: Lotte New York Palace is the first hotel to partner with Aescape, a New York-based robotics company that developed an AI-powered robot that gives back massages.
summary: Lotte New York Palace is the first hotel to partner with Aescape, a New York-based robotics company that developed an AI-powered robot that gives back massages.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: The search for a stock market alternative
content: Indian bonds attract foreign investors as Wall Street forecasts lackluster future growth in stock prices.
summary: Indian bonds attract foreign investors as Wall Street forecasts lackluster future growth in stock prices.

title: China's state media slams U.S. over Biden nuclear strategy report
content: The outspoken editor of the Global Times, a Beijing government mouthpiece, seized on a New York Times report to accuse Washington of hypocrisy.
summary: The outspoken editor of the Global Times, a Beijing government mouthpiece, seized on a New York Times report to accuse Washington of hypocrisy.

title: Mike Lynch, man once dubbed 'Britain's Bill Gates,' dies at age 59
content: Mike Lynch, who had just recently won a landmark U.S. fraud trial, was found dead in the wreckage of a yacht that sank off the coast of Sicily. He was 59.
summary: Mike Lynch, who had just recently won a landmark U.S. fraud trial, was found dead in the wreckage of a yacht that sank off the coast of Sicily. He was 59.

title: Trump could cash out his DJT stock within weeks. Here's what happens if he sells
content: Trump Media made its debut on the Nasdaq under the ticker DJT in late March, following a lengthy merger with a special purpose acquisition company.
summary: Trump Media made its debut on the Nasdaq under the ticker DJT in late March, following a lengthy merger with a special purpose acquisition company.

title: Hong Kong IPOs signal rebound as HKEX remains 'cautiously optimistic,' says CEO
content: Fundraising activity is rebounding on HKEX, reinforced by additional follow-on fundraising and a strong IPO pipeline, according to CEO Bonnie Chan.
summary: Fundraising activity is rebounding on HKEX, reinforced by additional follow-on fundraising and a strong IPO pipeline, according to CEO Bonnie Chan.

title: Peloton shares soar 35% as turnaround plan takes hold, losses shrink
content: Peloton has been working to generate free cash flow and return to profitability, and has made cuts to sales and marketing budgets to improve its balance sheet.
summary: Peloton has been working to generate free cash flow and return to profitability, and has made cuts to sales and marketing budgets to improve its balance sheet.

title: These are the 10 best 'workcation' cities in the world for hybrid workers
content: Budapest topped the list as the best destination for a 'workcation' in 2024, according to a study by the International Workplace Group.
summary: Budapest topped the list as the best destination for a 'workcation' in 2024, according to a study by the International Workplace Group.

title: This was the schedule of speakers on the final night of the DNC
content: Among the speakers: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper and GOP former Rep. Adam Kinzinger. The Chicks and Pink performed.

title: 'The World' is a luxury ship that travels the world full time — here's how much an apartment on it costs

title: Former FTX exec Ryan Salame's romantic partner indicted on campaign finance crimes
content: Michelle Bond was charged two months before her romantic partner, former FTX exec Ryan Salame, is due to surrender to being a prison sentence.
summary: Michelle Bond was charged two months before her romantic partner, former FTX exec Ryan Salame, is due to surrender to being a prison sentence.

title: Perplexity AI plans to start running ads in fourth quarter as AI-assisted search gains popularity
content: Following months of controversy surrounding plagiarism allegations, Perplexity AI is about to start selling ads alongside AI-assisted search results.
summary: Following months of controversy surrounding plagiarism allegations, Perplexity AI is about to start selling ads alongside AI-assisted search results.

title: Zoom stock has best day in almost 2 years on quarterly results, increased guidance
content: Zoom shares jumped on Thursday after the company reported better-than-expected results for the second quarter and lifted its full-year guidance.

title: Canadian rail shutdown leaves billions in U.S. trade stranded, with economic impact to grow day by day

summary: The lockout of Teamsters rail union workers by Canadian freight rail operators Canadian National Railway and Canadian Pacific Kansas City hits U.S. trade.

title: GM-owned Cruise will partner with Uber to offer driverless rides
content: Uber and Cruise have agreed to a multiyear partnership with the embattled AV company planning to offer driverless rides to Uber users as soon as next year.
summary: Uber and Cruise have agreed to a multiyear partnership with the embattled AV company planning to offer driverless rides to Uber users as soon as next year.

title: Snowflake shares sink 14% on decelerating product revenue growth
content: Shares of Snowflake fell after it released fiscal second-quarter 2025 earnings that showed decelerating product revenue growth compared to past quarters.
summary: Shares of Snowflake fell after it released fiscal second-quarter 2025 earnings that showed decelerating product revenue growth compared to past quarters.

title: Deutsche Bank shares rise 4% after settlement of bulk of claims in long-running Postbank suit
content: Deutsche Bank has reached a settlement with the bulk of claims in the Postbank suit, which have been hanging over the bank for years.
summary: Deutsche Bank has reached a settlement with the bulk of claims in the Postbank suit, which have been hanging over the bank for years.

title: Home sales rose in July for the first time in five months
content: At the end of the month there were 1.33 million homes on the market, an increase of 0.8% from June and 19.8% higher than July 2023.
summary: At the end of the month there were 1.33 million homes on the market, an increase of 0.8% from June and 19.8% higher than July 2023.

title: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and Morgan Stanley's Bloomer retrieved from yacht wreckage
content: Mike Lynch was one of 22 passengers aboard the Bayesian superyacht, which capsized while anchored off the coast of Sicily.
summary: Mike Lynch was one of 22 passengers aboard the Bayesian superyacht, which capsized while anchored off the coast of Sicily.

title: Oil tanker abandoned, adrift and ablaze after Red Sea attack
content: Greece's Minister of Shipping and Insular Policy Christos Stylianides condemned the attack as a "flagrant violation of the rules of international law."

title: What a Harris election victory could mean for Europe and the trans-Atlantic relationship
content: Analysts at the Economist Intelligence Unit said they expect the substance of Harris' position on major international issues to be similar to that of Biden's.

title: India walks a diplomatic tightrope, making friends with Ukraine while ally Russia watches on
content: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Ukraine on Friday is likely to be closely watched by both New Delhi's ally Russia and by Western partners.
summary: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Ukraine on Friday is likely to be closely watched by both New Delhi's ally Russia and by Western partners.

title: Bavarian Nordic shares pop over 13% on earnings beat, bumper mpox vaccine order
content: Shares of Danish biotech company Bavarian Nordic jumped Thursday after reporting first-half earnings and a bumper mpox vaccine order.
